content: अप्रतीत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not pleased or delighted. {@--2@} Unapproached; unassailable. {@--3@} Unopposed. {@--4@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) Not understood or clearly intelligible (as a word), one of the defects of a word (शब्ददोष); अप्रतीतं यत्केवले शास्त्रे प्रसिद्धं <ls>K. P. 7</ls>, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} a word is said to be अप्रतीत if it be used in a sense which it has in particular classes of works only (and not in general or popular use); {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} सम्यग्ज्ञानमहाज्योतिर्दलिताशयताजुषः (where आशय = वासना occurs in Yoga Śāstra only).
